data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Hazara, N.W.F.P., Pakistan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hazara, N.W.F.P., Pakistan

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Hazara access to a Bible in their own language.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,964,500 people living in Hazara through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Hazara, N.W.F.P., Pakistan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Rajput Dhamial people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, bring yourself glory in Hazara. Through your servants plant 392 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 5,478 believers in Hazara to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Hazara.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Hazara
location.people_groups_list: Moghal, Bazigar (Muslim traditions), Batwal (Muslim traditions), Pashtun Dilazak, Rahmani (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Moghal (1,306,000), Bazigar (Muslim traditions) (2,500), Batwal (Muslim traditions) (100), Pashtun Dilazak (27,000), Rahmani (Muslim traditions) (60,000)
